summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 CHRYSLER SEBRING. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V668000 (SEAT BELTS, AIR BAGS) HOWEVER, THE PARTS TO DO THE RECALL WERE NOT YET AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER HAD EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. GOLLING CHRYSLER DODGE JEEP RAM LOCATED AT: 2405 S. TELEGRAPH RB, BLOOMFIELD HILLS, MI 48302, TEL: (248)334-3600 WAS CONTACTED HOWEVER, THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT THE REMEDY PARTS HAD NOT BEEN PROVIDED TO THE FACILITY BY FCA.  THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. THE VIN TOOL CONFIRMED THE REMEDY WAS NOT YET AVAILABLE.
